00009 //#define TO_FILE
00010 //#define USE_CC
00011 
00012 #include "itpp/itcomm.h"
00013 #include "SISO.h"//SISO class
00014 #include "Progress_Timer.h"
00015 
00017 template <class Num_T>
00018 itpp::Vec<Num_T> kron(const itpp::Vec<Num_T> &in, const itpp::Vec<Num_T> &pattern)
00019 {
00020     int in_len = in.length();
00021     int pattern_len = pattern.length();
00022     itpp::Vec<Num_T> out(in_len*pattern_len);
00023     for (int n=0;n<in_len;n++)
00024         out.replace_mid(n*pattern_len, in(n)*pattern);
00025     return out;
00026 }
00027 
00028 using namespace itpp;
00029 using tr::SISO;
00030 using tr::threshold;
00031 using std::cout;
00032 using std::endl;
00033 using std::string;
00034 
00035 int main(void)
00036 {
00037     //general parameters
00038     string mud_method = "maxlogTMAP";
00039     int nb_usr = 2;
00040     int spreading_factor = 16;
00041 #ifdef USE_CC
00042     string map_metric="maxlogMAP";
00043     ivec gen = "037 021";
00044     int constraint_length = 5;
00045     spreading_factor = 8;
00046 #endif
00047     double threshold_value = 50;
00048     int ch_nb_taps = 4;//number of channel multipaths
00049     int nb_errors_lim = 1500;
00050     int nb_bits_lim = int(1e3);//int(1e6);
00051     int perm_len = 1024;//38400;//permutation length
00052     int nb_iter = 15;//number of iterations in the turbo decoder
00053     vec EbN0_dB = "10";//"0:10:20";
00054     double Ec = 1.0;//chip energy
00055 
00056 #ifdef USE_CC
00057     int inv_R = spreading_factor*gen.length();
00058 #else
00059     int inv_R = spreading_factor;
00060 #endif
00061     double R = 1.0/double(inv_R);//coding rate
00062 
00063     //other parameters
00064     string filename = "IDMA_"+mud_method+"_"+to_str(nb_usr)+".it";
00065 #ifdef USE_CC
00066     filename = "cc"+filename;
00067 #endif
00068     filename = "Res/"+filename;
00069     int nb_bits = perm_len/inv_R;//number of bits in a block
00070     vec sigma2 = (0.5*Ec/R)*pow(inv_dB(EbN0_dB), -1.0);//N0/2
00071     int nb_blocks = 0;//number of blocks
00072     int nb_errors = 0;//number of errors
00073     bmat bits(nb_usr,nb_bits);//data bits
00074 #ifdef USE_CC
00075     bvec coded_bits(nb_bits*gen.length());
00076     vec mod_bits(nb_bits*gen.length());
00077 #else
00078     vec mod_bits(nb_bits);
00079 #endif
00080     vec chips(perm_len);
00081     imat perm(nb_usr,perm_len);
00082     imat inv_perm(nb_usr,perm_len);
00083     vec em(perm_len);
00084     vec rec(perm_len+ch_nb_taps-1);//padding zeros are added
00085 
00086     //SISO MUD
00087     mat mud_apriori_data(nb_usr,perm_len);
00088     mat mud_extrinsic_data;
00089 
00090     //SISO decoder (scrambler or CC)
00091     vec dec_intrinsic_coded(perm_len);
00092     vec dec_apriori_data(nb_bits);
00093     dec_apriori_data.zeros();//always zero
00094     vec dec_extrinsic_coded;
00095     vec dec_extrinsic_data;
00096 
00097     //decision
00098     bvec rec_bits(nb_bits);
00099     int snr_len = EbN0_dB.length();
00100     mat ber(nb_iter,snr_len);
00101     ber.zeros();
00102     register int en,n,u;
00103 
00104 #ifdef USE_CC
00105     //CC
00106     Convolutional_Code nsc;
00107     nsc.set_generator_polynomials(gen, constraint_length);
00108 #endif
00109 
00110     //BPSK
00111     BPSK bpsk;
00112 
00113     //scrambler pattern
00114     vec pattern = kron(ones(spreading_factor/2), vec("1.0 -1.0"));
00115 
00116     //AWGN
00117     AWGN_Channel awgn;
00118     //multipath channel impulse response (Rayleigh fading) with real coefficients
00119     vec single_ch(ch_nb_taps);
00120     mat ch_imp_response(nb_usr, ch_nb_taps);
00121     vec ini_state = zeros(ch_nb_taps);
00122     MA_Filter<double,double,double> multipath_channel(ini_state);
00123     multipath_channel.set_state(ini_state);//initial state is always 0 due to Zero Padding technique
00124     vec padding_zeros = zeros(ch_nb_taps-1);
00125 
00126     //SISO blocks
00127     SISO siso;
00128     siso.set_scrambler_pattern(pattern);
00129     siso.set_mud_method(mud_method);
00130 #ifdef USE_CC
00131     siso.set_generators(gen, constraint_length);
00132     siso.set_map_metric(map_metric);
00133     siso.set_tail(false);
00134 #endif
00135 
00136     //BER
00137     BERC berc;
00138 
00139     //progress timer
00140     tr::Progress_Timer timer;
00141     timer.set_max(snr_len);
00142 
00143     //Randomize generators
00144     RNG_randomize();
00145 
00146     //main loop
00147     timer.progress(0.0);
00148     for (en=0;en<snr_len;en++)
00149     {
00150         awgn.set_noise(sigma2(en));
00151         siso.set_noise(sigma2(en));
00152         nb_errors = 0;
00153         nb_blocks = 0;
00154         while ((nb_errors<nb_errors_lim) && (nb_blocks*nb_bits<nb_bits_lim))//if at the last iteration the nb. of errors is inferior to lim, then process another block
00155         {
00156             rec.zeros();
00157             for (u=0;u<nb_usr;u++)
00158             {
00159                 //permutation
00160                 perm.set_row(u, sort_index(randu(perm_len)));
00161                 //inverse permutation
00162                 inv_perm.set_row(u, sort_index(perm.get_row(u)));
00163 
00164                 //bits generation
00165                 bits.set_row(u, randb(nb_bits));
00166 
00167 #ifdef USE_CC
00168                 //convolutional code
00169                 nsc.encode(bits.get_row(u), coded_bits);//no tail
00170 
00171                 //BPSK modulation (1->-1,0->+1)
00172                 mod_bits = bpsk.modulate_bits(coded_bits);
00173 #else
00174                 //BPSK modulation (1->-1,0->+1)
00175                 mod_bits = bpsk.modulate_bits(bits.get_row(u));
00176 #endif
00177 
00178                 //scrambler
00179                 chips = kron(mod_bits, pattern);
00180 
00181                 //permutation
00182                 em = chips(perm.get_row(u));
00183 
00184                 //multipath channel
00185                 single_ch = randray(ch_nb_taps);
00186                 single_ch /= sqrt(sum_sqr(single_ch));//normalized power profile
00187                 ch_imp_response.set_row(u, single_ch);
00188                 multipath_channel.set_coeffs(ch_imp_response.get_row(u));
00189                 rec += multipath_channel(concat(em, padding_zeros));//Zero Padding
00190             }
00191             rec = awgn(rec);
00192 
00193             //turbo MUD
00194             mud_apriori_data.zeros();//a priori LLR of emitted symbols
00195             siso.set_impulse_response(ch_imp_response);
00196             for (n=0;n<nb_iter;n++)
00197             {
00198                 //MUD
00199                 siso.mud(mud_extrinsic_data, rec, mud_apriori_data);
00200                 berc.clear();//mean error rate over all users
00201                 for (u=0;u<nb_usr;u++)
00202                 {
00203                     //deinterleave
00204                     dec_intrinsic_coded = mud_extrinsic_data.get_row(u)(inv_perm.get_row(u));
00205 #ifdef USE_CC
00206                     //decoder+descrambler
00207                     siso.nsc(dec_extrinsic_coded, dec_extrinsic_data, dec_intrinsic_coded, dec_apriori_data);
00208 #else
00209                     //descrambler
00210                     siso.descrambler(dec_extrinsic_coded, dec_extrinsic_data, dec_intrinsic_coded, dec_apriori_data);
00211 #endif
00212                     //decision
00213                     rec_bits = bpsk.demodulate_bits(-dec_extrinsic_data);//suppose that a priori info is zero
00214                     //count errors
00215                     berc.count(bits.get_row(u), rec_bits);
00216                     //interleave+threshold
00217                     mud_apriori_data.set_row(u, threshold(dec_extrinsic_coded(perm.get_row(u)), threshold_value));
00218                 }
00219                 ber(n,en) += berc.get_errorrate();
00220             }//end iterations
00221             nb_errors += int(berc.get_errors());//get number of errors at the last iteration
00222             nb_blocks++;
00223         }//end blocks (while loop)
00224 
00225         //compute BER over all tx blocks
00226         ber.set_col(en, ber.get_col(en)/nb_blocks);
00227 
00228         //show progress
00229         timer.progress(1+en);
00230     }
00231     timer.toc_print();
00232 
00233     //save results to file
00234 #ifdef TO_FILE
00235     it_file ff(filename);
00236     ff << Name("BER") << ber;
00237     ff << Name("EbN0_dB") << EbN0_dB;
00238     ff << Name("nb_usr") << nb_usr;
00239     ff << Name("gen") << spreading_factor;
00240     ff << Name("nb_iter") << nb_iter;
00241     ff << Name("total_nb_bits") << nb_bits;
00242     ff << Name("nb_errors_lim") << nb_errors_lim;
00243     ff << Name("nb_bits_lim") << nb_bits_lim;
00244 #ifdef USE_CC
00245     ff << Name("gen") << gen;
00246 #endif
00247     ff.close();
00248 #else
00249     //show BER
00250     cout << ber << endl;
00251 #endif
00252 
00253     return 0;
00254 }
